task.title: Adding a Column to a Board
task.shortdesc: In some cases, an extra column might be necessary for custom fields. Whether it's extra deadlines, timelines, notes, or a custom section, it can be quickly added to the board.

step.cmd: From the Boards page, locate the board that will be given another column
Select the "+" icon in the top right corner of the board
A dropdown will appear, giving options for the type of columns available. Select the best option for your board
A new column will be created, and can be edited from the boards page
